attributes.action: Vote for a new Public Referendum on Brexit   September  2018
attributes.additional_details: Too much evidence and background to list! Key issues lost in the midst of personality and party conflicts and vested interest.
attributes.background: Sadiq Khan has gone public and supported the view of many others that there should be another public Referendum on Brexit ... After 2 years of of negotiations, no deal other than a great deal of fallout, we have lost confidence both in the decision and the decision makers.
